reviews.review: Amazing Game

This is by far one of the greatest games I have played. It has a very dramatic shift from the original Half-Life, while still keeping the same core gameplay. I've owned this game for years and still play it again and again. If you want the full experience for the Half-Life story, you need to also have Half-Life, Half-Life 2: Episode 1, and Half-Life 2: Episode 2. If you want even more games tied to this one's story line, get Portal 1 and 2 and also the expansion packs.

半条命2算是我的SLG+FPS启蒙游戏。
2005年，3DM还没有做盗版，ALI213还只有各种游戏补丁，盗版光碟才4块钱一张。高二的我斥巨资购买半条命2，开启了弗里曼博士拯救人类的旅途。
我永远记得格里高利神父手持霰弹枪在火海上布道的样子，记忆中高高的阁楼上应该有月光洒下。贼TM酷。从此我就爱上了用霰弹枪近战爆头。
虽然猎头蟹和藤壶怪给正值发育期的我留下了不小的阴影，但是这是我玩过最爽的打僵尸游戏。比L4D还爽。
那时我的小水管只能用电话线拨号，电脑插着256MB的内存，NVIDIA GF440卡的我一愣一愣，藏经阁经常涨价买回家还打不开。但是我依然徜徉其中乐此不疲。
而现在，200M的带宽下GTAV只是分分钟，电脑内存水涨船高从512M加到16G，[spoiler] 当然破显卡还是破显卡[/spoiler]，但是再也没有打开藏经阁的那种惊喜了。
回忆中最有趣的部分，还是好基友强行要表演大鹏展翅、基洛夫教做人、联机打墨菲斯托因为分赃不均绝交、雪见挡暗器的中二悲伤。
还有打开字幕看见[猎头蟹警戒][猎头蟹发出嘶嘶声]的蹑手蹑脚。
回忆最有趣的地方，就在于回忆本身。
致敬VALVE。

Half Life 2 is a great, classic game. It came after the groundbreaking Half Life original, and just as astonishing in terms of gameplay and entertainment. The graphics in this game are stunning for the time, and it is an overall well rounded and enjoyable experience. If you have an older computer from ~2009, now is the time to dig it out of storage, maybe throw in an SSD and a used video card, and get gaming.

Как и ожидалось - продолжение саги о путешествиях физика - теоретика Гордона Фримена будет иметь довольно продолжительный, оригинальный и ни с чем не сравнимое продолжение. Как обычно, нашему любимому главному герою предстоит спасти ситуацию из полного краха, и при этом выжить.
Как обычно, с монтировкой в руках Гордон борется с различной нечистью - зомби и комбайнами и при этом старается спасти людей, подвергающихся полному геноциду со стороны Альянса - инопланетной организации, держащей под контролем данную территорию.

Simplesmente foderoso. Half Life é uma daquelas franquias de jogos que você tem que experimentar pelo menos uma vez.
A premissa é muito boa, a jogabilidade flui bem, os personagens são muito bons (incluindo o trabalho de voz).... Resumindo: é a sequência que o primeiro HL merecia.
RECOMENDADÍSSIMO.
I've played this game series before. It's a masterpiece of art.

[h1] HALF-LIFE 2 [/h1]

It's been a solid 3 years since I went for a full run of Half-Life 2, including episodes, and, I really missed it. And It's been 3 years since I updated my review so that's also why. Even tho this game is as old as me,, the game fascinates me. I mean, look at other games that came out in 2004. GTA:SA, Warcraft 3, Halo 2, these games are great, but compared to them, Half-Life 2 is absolutely brilliant. From it's graphics, physics, characters, all the way to sound design. No doubt that it was ahead of it's time.

[h1] Graphics and World Design [/h1]
Man, the fact that this game came out 17 years ago blows my mind. It looks amazing and it aged really well. The streets of City 17 are truly unnerving. There is a goddamn war, but it still feels empty and depressing. That's why I love it so much. I love to come back to these streets of City 17 that are haunting me with feeling of not being alone or to the majestic forrest and claustrophobic caves of Episode Two.  The world just keeps on giving on every corner. Half-Life 2 doesn't need to have huge open world to make you feel like you have whole world in the palm of your hand.

[h1] Physics [/h1]
My, this is something different. the physics is one of the best parts of the gameplay. I find it way more fun to use my environment and just throw random objects with Graphity gun at enemies. Here you go, throw that barrel to blow the dude up, throw that gas tank to light 'em up, throw that saw wheel to split that mf in half! 

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]
The main game can take more than 10 hours to complete on your 1st playthrough. But with both Episodes you are going for some great adventure. Even without the episodes, it's really fun to replay the game, hunt down the achievements or just discover more locations or try out different routes. It's fun, doesn't get boring, and most importantly, it feels real. Whenever something explodes in my face, I shoot from a revolver or shotgun or the godforsaken black headcrab jumps on my goddamn face out of nowhere, it flinches with my whole body. And it doesn't have a cutscenes. You are following the whole story by your own very eyes. Things are happening to you, people are talking to you. 

[h1] Characters [/h1]
I love the characters. I am going to sound like overweight redditor, but I fell in love with Alyx. I like her company, her voice and her face expressions. Talking about expressions, Half-Life 2 mastered face animation. I can't believe stretching textures can feel so natural. I can't hold myself but smile or wink back at someone. Even voice actors did a great job.

[h1] Story [/h1]
So here we are, Dr. Freeman. You are a scientist who got nothing to say, but has a crowbar. As Breen himself said, "This is not some agent provocateur or highly trained assassin we are discussing. Gordon Freeman is a theoretical physicist who had hardly earned the distinction of his Ph.D. at the time of the Black Mesa Incident. - The man you have consistently failed to slow, let alone capture, is by all standards simply that--an ordinary man.". So here we are. My man Gordon joins the Rebels to fight off Dr. Breen's administration and power of Combine - inter-dimensional organisation that wants to enslave and dominate as many species as possible. And we, scientist with crowbar and good aim and bunch of random folks are about to take these mfs down! Humans that are just tired of everyone's bullsh*t vs. mf inter-dimentional fascists. What an amazing ride. 

The only bad thing is that Episode Three never arrived. Seeing how interesting story of Project Borealis could have been and what a great finale it could have become for this legendary franchise. 
But hey, we got Half-Life: Alyx!

[h1] Verdickt [/h1]
[b]+[/b] Story

My favorite part of the whole Half-life franchise... This masterpeice really helped me understand the "story" that is Half-life.
The year in which this game was created it has beautiful graphics, and even its gun meachanics are neat...
You'll love the story, gameplay, charactors.. Etc..
You also don't have to play the first half-life in order to grasp the game...
Also, if by-chance you do want to by the first Half-life before... I'd recommend "Black Mesa" because of its beauty...
Only downside... They're not finished with XEN yet..
